# Pull Request

## Type of Change

- [ ] feat
- [ ] fix
- [ ] refactor
- [ ] chore
- [ ] docs

## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Scope

- [ ] UI
- [ ] i18n
- [ ] routing
- [ ] state management
- [ ] CI/CD

## Architecture Checks

- [ ] Import direction respected (`app -> pages -> features -> shared`)
- [ ] No deep cross-feature imports
- [ ] Public APIs exported through `index.ts`
- [ ] Shared layer does not depend on higher layers

## Testing Evidence

- [ ] Lint passes (`pnpm lint:check`)
- [ ] Typecheck passes (`pnpm typecheck`)
- [ ] Build passes (`pnpm build`)
- [ ] Manual validation completed

## Risk and Rollout

- [ ] This change is low risk
- [ ] Rollback plan is documented
- [ ] Monitoring/verification steps are documented

## Screenshots

Include before/after screenshots for UI changes.
